doc.field: Saint Andrew's Society of the State of New York records
Saint Andrew's Society of the State of New York records
Subseries I.5: Constitution, Rules, and History
Subseries I.5: Constitution, Rules, and History

The Society periodically produced publications, in addition to the annual reports, that compiled various types of organizational information. These items include governing rules and narrative histories that describe the leadership and activities of the organization over time. They are arranged chronologically.
